data.text: @thehill Tl;dr: Leadership sabotaged their own legislation by deciding to take money back from the states, then tanked the whole thing when that didn't fly with Members. Now pelosi is blaming the GOP for the loss of funding.

@thehill What? No “Republicans are stopping us!” this time Dems?

No weeks of Manchin/Sinema blocking games?

“Parliamentarian”?

So as long there’s as nothing they’re doing nothing for any of us suffering right here (like needed Covid relief #M4A or UBI)?

Congress moves swiftly as one🧐
@nicholaswolfson @thehill I feel amazed that they still bow, everyday. Nixon would have LOVED THEM.
@shepersisted76 @thehill Tax the poor? What good comes out of sticking together when it causes poverty.. Big yuge poverty. https://t.co/kIvNEVEtkr
@terrific646 @thehill So do republicans have a plan yet? https://t.co/XeeknnB6sy
@sidney52447036 @thehill Have you seen the numbers??? They are big time. Yuge
@thehill @shepersisted76 You make an asinine comment, then block me before I can respond? Weak. Very weak.
@thehill l'm so happy because I just received my payment successfully from Thompson harry thanks for keeping to your words I now believe that your program is real . @thompson_harry0
